DOC.brief_summary: This phase 4 , 24-week , randomize , parallel , open-label study meal replacement program Glucerna SR obese Asian participant type 2 diabetes . The duration subject 's participation approximately 28 week , include lead-in period 2 week 2-week post-treatment telephone follow-up . A sufficient number Asian subject type 2 diabetes BMI 18 25-40 kg/m2 meet inclusion criterion none exclusion criterion enter study randomize approximately 60 subject . Approximately 60 participant randomize receive either ( 1 ) meal replacement program Glucerna SR top Exchange-diet plan ( EDP ) ( 2 ) caloric-matched EDP . The primary objective study evaluate effect diet program include Glucerna SR meal replacement postprandial glucose response use Glucerna SR 24 week obese Asian subject type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Postprandial Metabolic Response After Use Glucerna SR Obese Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: A sufficient number Asian subject ( expect approximately 90 ) type 2 diabetes BMI 18 25-40 kg/m2 meet inclusion criterion none exclusion criterion enter study randomize approximately 60 subject . The eligible obese subject type 2 diabetes enter 2-week lead-in period EDP individual diet/lifestyle consultation implement nutrition therapy exist diabetes management . The diet recommendation EDP lead-in period base nutrition recommendation ADA include carbohydrate monounsaturated fat together provide 60-70 % energy intake , reduce intake saturate fat ( < 10 % total calorie ) cholesterol ( < 300 mg/day ) protein intake around 15-20 % total daily energy . Approximately 60 participant randomize Week 0 ( Visit 3 ) 1:1 ratio receive either ( 1 ) meal replacement program Glucerna SR top EDP ( 2 ) caloric-matched EDP . The participant receive educational program diet , exercise , behavioral strategy randomization . Each randomize subject meal replacement group receive Glucerna SR replace one meal ( breakfast ) one pre-sleep snack 24 week . The subject group EDP receive meal plan like lead-in period . All study subject place diet plan 500 ~ 800 kcal/day le estimated daily maintenance energy requirement receive individualize exercise prescription facilitate optimal diabetes management . The participant visit clinic 4-week interval 24 week randomization evaluate efficacy safety parameter . The participant receive two different meal test baseline end study . The macronutrient composition meal test protocol 1 480 Kcal Glucerna SR breakfast 50 % CHO , 20 % protein , 30 % fat . The test meal protocol 2 480 Kcal sandwich breakfast 63 % CHO , 20 % protein , 17 % fat . The primary efficacy variable change baseline incremental area curve ( âˆ†AUC ) glucose response Glucerna-SR test meal two group . A telephone follow-up perform 2 week study evaluate condition relate study .
DOC.criteria: Asians Diagnosed type 2 diabetes BMI 25 40 kgm2 Aged 20 75 year old Current HbA1c 6.0 8.5 percent Men nonpregnant woman . If woman , subject either childbearing potential , defined postmenopausal least 1 year surgically sterile , childbearing potential practice one follow method birth controlcondoms , sponge , foam , jelly , diaphragm intrauterine device contraceptive 3month period prior Screeninga vasectomize partnertotal abstinence sexual intercourse . If woman , result urine pregnancy test perform Screening negative . If woman , subject breastfeeding Subject able willing replace breakfast one snack bed Glucerna SR Subject voluntarily sign date informed consent form , approve Institutional Review Board Independent Ethics Committee , prior undertake studyspecific procedure History evidence type 1 diabetes Screening fast glucose great 240 mgdL Treatment insulin , alphaglucosidase inhibitor , incretin mimetics , DPPIV inhibitor past 8 week History severe hypoglycemia past 12 week History severe diabetes complication e.g . amputation , blindness , diabetic coma Stated history severe gastroparesis Stated significant cardiovascular event e.g. , myocardial infarction , stroke within 6 week prior study entry ; state history congestive heart failure Current use glucocorticoid steroid exception topical use . History renal insufficiency serum creatinine great 1.4 mgdL woman great 1.5 men Subjects follow laboratory value : hemoglobin le 10 gdL , WBC le 3000mL , platelet le 100,000mL , ALT great 3x ULN , total bilirubin great 2x ULN Stated current severe hepatic disease History evidence alcoholism drug abuse History evidence hyperthyroidism hypothyroidism History malignancy within last 5 year Consumption investigational drug within 30 day prior enrollment . Taking herbal dietary supplement past 8 week could profoundly affect appetite , weight glucose metabolism Voluntary involuntary weight loss great 7 percent body weight past 8 week History major eat disorder , anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa Allergy Glucerna SR content History mental incapacity language barrier may preclude adequate understanding cooperation study Current concomitant illness would interfere subject 's ability perform study would confound study result
